question: Who is considered the great elder and creator of the heavens in Kapampangan mythology?
Which deity is the Kapampangan sun god of war and death, and also taught metallurgy and rice culture?
Who is the moon god who lives in Mt. Pinatubo and rules over eight rivers?
Which deity is known as the bright star and introduced wet-rice culture?
Who is also known as the golden serpent and represents dawn?
What does Kapampangan indigenous religion refer to?
options: The traditional beliefs and practices of the Kapampangans before foreign influences
The modern Christian practices in Pampanga
Religious festivals introduced during Spanish colonization
Western scientific beliefs adopted in Kapampangan communities
answer: The traditional beliefs and practices of the Kapampangans before foreign influences
